languages.text: {n}Сомнительная попытка — учитывая то, что вы не являетесь техножрецом, умеющим обслуживать сакральные машины. От количества кнопок и проводов на каждом костяном затылке становится не по себе, и вы оставляете эту бесплодную попытку.{/n}

{n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сомнительная попытка — учитывая то, что вы не являетесь техножрецом, умеющим обслуживать сакральные машины. От количества кнопок и проводов на каждом костяном затылке становится не по себе, и вы оставляете эту бесплодную попытку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest who knows how to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

{n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest who knows how to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

{n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

{n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの試みは最初から失敗することが決まっている。あなたは技術司祭ではなく、これらの神聖な機械を修理するための知識も持ち合わせていない。どのスカルの背面にも並んだ膨大な数のボタンや配線に圧倒され、あなたは検査の途中で諦めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの試みは最初から失敗することが決まっている。あなたは技術司祭ではなく、これらの神聖な機械を修理するための知識も持ち合わせていない。どのスカルの背面にも並んだ膨大な数のボタンや配線に圧倒され、あなたは検査の途中で諦めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Versuch ist von Anfang an zum Scheitern verurteilt – du bist {mf|kein Techpriester|keine Techpriesterin} und hast nicht das nötige Wissen, um diese heiligen Maschinen zu bedienen. Alleine die schiere Anzahl an Knöpfen und Kabeln auf der Rückseite jedes Schädels macht dich benommen, und nach der Hälfte deiner Untersuchung gibst du auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Versuch ist von Anfang an zum Scheitern verurteilt – du bist {mf|kein Techpriester|keine Techpriesterin} und hast nicht das nötige Wissen, um diese heiligen Maschinen zu bedienen. Alleine die schiere Anzahl an Knöpfen und Kabeln auf der Rückseite jedes Schädels macht dich benommen, und nach der Hälfte deiner Untersuchung gibst du auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre entreprise est vouée à l'échec : vous n'êtes pas technoprêtre, et vous ne disposez pas des compétences suffisantes pour modifier ces machines sacrées. La fonctionnalité de la foule de boutons et de câbles qui ornent l'arrière de chaque crâne vous dépasse, et vous renoncez bien vite à votre projet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre entreprise est vouée à l'échec : vous n'êtes pas technoprêtre, et vous ne disposez pas des compétences suffisantes pour modifier ces machines sacrées. La fonctionnalité de la foule de boutons et de câbles qui ornent l'arrière de chaque crâne vous dépasse, et vous renoncez bien vite à votre projet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu tentativa está abocada al fracaso; no eres tecnosacerdote y careces de los conocimientos necesarios para manipular estas máquinas sagradas. El ingente amasijo de botones y cables que hay en la parte trasera de cada cráneo te apabulla hasta tal punto que optas por renunciar a la inspección.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu tentativa está abocada al fracaso; no eres tecnosacerdote y careces de los conocimientos necesarios para manipular estas máquinas sagradas. El ingente amasijo de botones y cables que hay en la parte trasera de cada cráneo te apabulla hasta tal punto que optas por renunciar a la inspección.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的尝试从一开始就注定徒劳无功。你并不是技术神甫，也缺乏足够的知识，完全无法理解这些神圣的机器。每颗头骨后面的无数按钮、电线让你眼花缭乱，你仅仅试到一半就当了逃兵。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的尝试从一开始就注定徒劳无功。你并不是技术神甫，也缺乏足够的知识，完全无法理解这些神圣的机器。每颗头骨后面的无数按钮、电线让你眼花缭乱，你仅仅试到一半就当了逃兵。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Daha en baştan elini yüzüne bulaştırıyorsun. Tekno Rahip olmadığın için bu kutsal makineler üzerinde yetkinlik sahibi değilsin. Her bir kafatasının ardındaki düğmeler ve kablolar, kafanı allak bullak ediyor. Başladığın işi bitirmeden pes ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt is doomed from the start — you are not a Tech-Priest, and lack the knowledge to service these sacred machines. The sheer arsenal of buttons and wires on the back of every skull leaves you dazed, and you give up halfway through your examination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Daha en başında elini yüzüne bulaştırıyorsun. Tekno Rahip olmadığın için bu kutsal makineler hakkında yetkin değilsin. Her bir kafatasının ardındaki düğmeler ve kablolar, kafanı allak bullak ediyor. Başladığın işi bitirmeden pes ediyorsun.{/n}
